content:
Six units of enemy armored vehicles destroyed the soldiers of the 46th separate airmobile brigade during the reflection of the next assault.

Appropriate videoHe outlined March 12Commander of the operational-strategic group of Tavriya troops Brigadny General Alexander Tarnavsky.

The video recorded the picturesque destruction of Russian tanks and armored vehicles.

BeforeThe Armyinform reportedthat the defense forces eliminated the Buk-M2 SPR in the Tavriya direction.
title: Paratroopers made a massacre of hostile technique in Donetsk direction
description: The corresponding video was posted on March 12 by the commander of the operational-strategic group of troops ...
author: Army Inform
